news.description: Streamline the upload of shared documents from your company or work team from Microsoft SharePoint.
We have improved the experience in chat details to allow a complete visualization of the information accessible to the virtual assistant.
Optimize the creation of virtual assistants that integrate your knowledge base with SAP tables or databases using the new assistants to create assistants.
Deepen the conversation to get greater clarity and offer more precise answers.
Friendly and empathetic responses that generate a genuine connection with the user
Continuous improvement through autonomous learning to better adapt to user needs
For this version, we included the possibility of downloading all users in CSV or Excel format, to easily manage all users who are on your platform.
We enabled from the security tab, the option to upload more than one user at the same time and send access invitations.

We have added the possibility for each user to select their home screen. This new functionality allows customizing the user experience from the first moment, adapting to the individual preferences and needs of each user. Thus, accessibility is improved and navigation efficiency on the platform is optimized.

From now on, a more precise and reliable extraction of information mentioned in any video can be performed. This improvement ensures that you can access valuable and relevant data quickly and without interruptions.
With our latest update, you can download the conversations of any virtual assistant in Excel format.
We have optimized the document upload process, allowing greater speed and efficiency in file management.
The interface has been renewed to offer a more intuitive and user-friendly experience.

The new integration of DAIANA in Microsoft Teams allows your collaborators to communicate fluently within Teams chats, improving efficiency and information accessibility, interacting in real time, obtaining instant answers. This not only improves productivity but also optimizes the user experience by centralizing AI interactions on a platform they already use daily.
DAIANA offers you the possibility to choose in each of your assistants the generative AI model that best suits your needs, giving you greater flexibility and customization in creation.

We have added prompt generation to the configuration of each assistant, giving you the ability to create and customize prompts more precisely, which improves the accuracy and relevance of your assistants' responses. In addition, with the help of DAIANA itself, you can generate these prompts easily by simply providing your key insights, which facilitates the creation of more specific interactions adapted to your needs without the need for advanced technical knowledge.
Now you will receive timely notifications about your plan's expiration time, ensuring that you can manage it without service interruptions.
Now you can access DAIANA faster and more securely using your Google account. With this new authentication option, we simplify access and improve the protection of your data.
We have developed Daiana Studio, which allows you to design personalized conversation flows with artificial intelligence to automate processes. With Daiana Studio you can:
